description: For fall 2021,they decided to make their Voltage Jacket with a full front zipper for layering and easy on and off. They recommend the super light Voltage as a travel companion for all kinds of weather contingencies ranging from just brisk all the way to blistering. With 60 gram PrimaLoft® Gold Insulation packed into their unique “lightning” quilting and a hood, the Voltage is versatile warmth that works equally well as a stand alone piece or layered under a shell.
name: Howler Bros Voltage Full Zip Jacket - Mens
